nodes.documentation:
Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of
_Prtcl perspectives
nodes.name: Uprtcl

nodes.documentation:
Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer, the context and the name of the perspective are initialized
 but can be updated independently using updatePerspectiveDetails(). Validation of the perspectiveId to contextHash should be done
 externally using any content addressable storage solution for the perspectiveId.
 The perspectiveId is emited to help perspectiveHash reverse mapping
nodes.name: addPerspectiveStr

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only the owner can update the perspective"

nodes.documentation:
internal function that updates the head pointer of a given perspective. It dont
check the owner to let the request functionality do it. Its internal
so user should use updateHeads instead.
nodes.name: updateHead

nodes.documentation: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation: Get the perspective owner and details from its ID
nodes.name: getPerspectiveDetails

nodes.documentation:
One method to execute the head updates directly, without creating the request. Useful
if the owner dont want to use the request authorization feature.
It also works for updating one single perspective
nodes.name: updateHeads

nodes.documentation:
Creates a new request owned and initialize its properties.
The id of the request is derived from the message sender to prevent frontrunning attacks.
nodes.name: initRequest

addPerspectiveStr((bytes32,bytes32,strin.notice: Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer, the context and the name of the perspective are initialized but can be updated independently using updatePerspectiveDetails(). Validation of the perspectiveId to contextHash should be done externally using any content addressable storage solution for the perspectiveId. The perspectiveId is emited to help perspectiveHash reverse mapping
